text: Marion Reichelt (née Weser; born 23 December 1962) is a German female former track and field athlete who competed in the long jump and heptathlon for East Germany. She was a heptathlon silver medallist at the European Cup Combined Events in 1987 and set a personal best score of 6442 points, ranking seventh on the world lists for that season.European Combined Events Cup. GBR Athletics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She placed sixth at the 1987 World Championships in Athletics in her only global senior performance.Marion Reichelt. Track and Field Statistics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She holds a long jump best of .Marion Reichelt. IAAF. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She was listed among leaked Stasi documents, published by Brigitte Berendonk, as having been subject to the East German state doping programme.Brigitte Berendonk: Doping. Von der Forschung zum Betrug.
